original_text: But the other person may have died. If they have no relative who can accept the money, the money must go to the Lord. The person who did a wrong thing must give the money and a male sheep to the priest. The sheep is a special gift to the Lord to make everything right. Then I will forgive that person.
korean_text: 만일 죄 값을 받을 만한 친척이 없으면 그 죄 값을 여호와께 드려 제사장에게로 돌릴 것이니 이는 그를 위하여 속죄할 속죄의 숫양과 함께 돌릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But the other person may have died.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 사람은 죽었을 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: the money must go to the Lord.
The person who did a wrong thing
must give the money and a male sheep
The sheep is a special gift to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그 양은 주께 드리는 특별한 선물입니다

sentences.original_text: Then I will forgive that person.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 그 사람을 용서할 것입니다.
